known_issues: Failed to fetch error occurring in application

existing_features.title: Investigate and resolve the 'Failed to fetch' error occurring in the application by checking network requests, API endpoint availability, CORS configuration, and error handling in the CoinGecko service and React Query hooks
Add error boundary components and improve error handling in useCoinGecko hooks to gracefully handle network failures and display user-friendly error messages instead of generic fetch failures

new_feature_requests.summary: Verify that the backend actor connections are functioning correctly and that Internet Identity authentication is not causing fetch failures in useActor hook
